alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 12:54PM CDT until May 05 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wagoner County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Tullahassee, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Wagoner... Okay... Hulbert... Porter... Oaks... Tullahassee... Scraper... Peggs... Sequoyah State Park... Redbird... Lost City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
